key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including ongoing litigation and HIPAA compliance issues
Dependence on physician referrals and reimbursement policies
Competitive pressures and need for continuous technological investment
Patient privacy concerns and potential reputational damage
controversies: Class-action lawsuits alleging unlawful disclosure of patient health information
Pending contract dispute with IPFS Corporation of California
social_issues: Patient privacy violations and ethical concerns regarding data disclosure
governance_issues: Potential financial instability due to ongoing litigation

sources.title: RadNet bracing for $11M drop in 2021 revenue following Medicare ...
sources.snippet: Imaging giant RadNet Inc. expects its revenues to decline by about $11 million in 2021 due to recently proposed federal reimbursement changes. Examine risks related to changes in healthcare reimbursement policies and potential financial impacts
